mapper.insert: insert into user_vo (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email, user_birthday, user_phone, user_nickname, user_photo) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_birthday}, #{user_phone}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_photo})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_pw from user_vo where user_id = #{userID}
